justification: The Offering ('The Ring must be destroyed.') and Interfaces (pirate ship haunted by a ghost) are entirely unrelated to the Ability requirement of modular digital twin application development and reusable business capabilities. There is no mention of digital twins, modularity, or PBCs.
ability: The ability to use a modular digital twin application development approach to rapidly compose and recompose digital twin services that deliver use case specific outcomes.
